title: Honorâ€™s new flagship smartphones feature a unique design and top-of-the-line hardware
content:
After unveiling its first foldable device last month, Honor is back with two new flagship smartphones — the Honor Magic 4 and Honor Magic 4 Pro. Honor’s latest devices feature a unique design, top-of-the-line hardware, and pretty much everything you would expect to see on a 2022 flagship. If you’re in the market for a

The post Honor’s new flagship smartphones feature a unique design and top-of-the-line hardware appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The new Honor Magic 4 and Honor Magic 4 Pro feature a unique design and top-of-the-line hardware. Read on to learn more about Honor's latest flagships.
